Submit a violation

Get help with building violations

Just enter the address of the property in violation and receive instant quotes from local professionals

We help you find the right building violation professional at the right price!

How it works

how to resolve a building violation notice in 3 quick steps

1. Get introduced to pros

Tell us about your notice of building violation and we'll introduce you to several experienced professionals in your area who are ready to:

  • Remedy corrected and uncorrected violations
  • Obtain permits and coordinate contractors
  • Mitigate penalties and assess of filing fees
  • Represent you at the environmental quality control board
  • Resolve HPD violations and inspections

2. Compare professionals

Within hours, interested and available professionals will send you custom quotes. Each quote includes:

  • Price estimate
  • Customer reviews
  • Contact info
  • Personalized message
  • Business profile

3. Hire the right pro

When you're ready, hire an experienced professional to work on your building violation at a price that's right for you.

Ready? Start now!

Services

How can building violation pros help you?

Permits and DOB Filing

Let a professional take care of anything you need done related to a permit application or any kind of administrative procedure with your city's Department of Buildings (DOB).

Read More

Building Violation Removal

Professional removal of violations in various ways, including representation at the Environmental Control Board (ECB) court, and on time filing of all paperwork to the Department of Buildings.

Read More

Property Research

Research a property for prospective buyers, owners or property managers, in order to find existing uncorrected violations.

Read More

what happy customers say about buildingviolation.com

Sarah Smith, Columbus (OH)
